\documentclass{standalone}
 
\usepackage{pgfplots}
 
\pgfplotsset{compat = newest}
 
\begin{document}
 
\begin{tikzpicture}
 
\begin{axis}[
    xmin = 0, xmax = 4.0,
    ymin = 0, ymax = 1.2,
    xtick distance = 2.5,
    ytick distance = 0.5,
    grid = both,
    minor tick num = 1,
    major grid style = {lightgray},
    minor grid style = {lightgray!25},
    width = \textwidth,
    height = 0.5\textwidth,
    xlabel = {$x$},
    ylabel = {$y$},
    legend pos=south east]
 
% Plot a function
% \addplot[
%     domain = 0:30,
%     samples = 200,
%     smooth,
%     thick,
%     blue,
% ] {exp(-x/10)*( cos(deg(x)) + sin(deg(x))/10 )};
 
% Plot data from a file
\addplot table [
    x=x,
    y=a,
    smooth,
    thin,
    red,
    dashed,
    col sep=comma
] {beobachtung.csv};
\addplot table [
    x=x,
    y=b,
    smooth,
    thin,
    red,
    dashed,
    col sep=comma
] {beobachtung.csv};
\addplot table [
    x=x,
    y=c,
    smooth,
    thin,
    red,
    dashed,
    col sep=comma
] {beobachtung.csv};

\addlegendentry{Reagenzglas 1}
\addlegendentry{Reagenzglas 2}
\addlegendentry{Reagenzglas 3}
 
\end{axis}
 
\end{tikzpicture}
 
\end{document}
